Class ServerUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appsrox.instachat.client.ServerUtilities

  • public final class ServerUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to communicate with GAE server.

            java.lang.String regId)
        * On successful registration of email account with GCM, register this device on GAE server .
        Parameters:
        email - Account to register
        regId - Registration ID returned by GCM on successful registration of this email account

        Parameters:

        java.io.IOException - propagated from POST.

      • uplaod

        public static java.lang.String uplaod(java.lang.String file,
                      java.lang.String messageId)
        * Uploads file to server by calling uploadToSever along with unique message identifier to associate uploaded file with chat message.
        Parameters:
        file - Path to file
        messageId - Unique identifier to distinguish uploaded file and associate with chat message
        Returns:
        Remote path to uploaded file on successful upload, null otherwise

      • uploadToSever

        private static java.lang.String uploadToSever(java.lang.String url,
                             java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> nameValuePairs)
        * Uploads file to server.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to post file content and message id to
        nameValuePairs - file path and message ID in name-value pair format
        Returns:
        Remote path to uploaded file on successful upload, null otherwise

      • downloadFile

        public static java.lang.String downloadFile(java.lang.String imageUrl,
                            java.lang.String filename)
        * Downloads file from server and save it's content in filename provided.
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - URL to file to download
        filename - Path to destination file on local SD card
        Returns:
        Path to file downloaded on local SD card
